txt.en: The Corsairs boldly fly their colours in Hashadîr, the encampment near Dol Amroth. \n\nYou should replace their banners with Gondorian colours, for this land has not yet been claimed for Umbar.
You have littered Hashadîr with the flags of Gondor, which will do much to dishearten the Corsairs who have begun to raid these southern lands.
The Corsairs boldly fly their colours in Hashadîr, the encampment near Dol Amroth.
You have littered Hashadîr with the flags of Gondor, which will do much to dishearten the Corsairs who have begun to raid these southern lands.
Raised a banner of Dol Amroth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Replace banners of Umbar with banners of Gondor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Banners of Umbar fly in Hashadîr, the Corsair camp south-west of Dol Amroth in Belfalas.\n\nYou should replace the Corsairs' banners with Gondorian ones.
